headline: Pentair Just Paid Out: Is This Industrial Dividend Built to Last?
summary: Pentair plc (PNR) delivered its latest quarterly dividend of $0.27 per share on February 6, 2026, marking another milestone in a streak that now spans 50 consecutive years of annual dividend increases. At a current price of $102.08, the water treatment specialist offers a modest yield that reflects its growth-oriented profile rather than income maximization ... Pentair Just Paid Out: Is This Industrial Dividend Built to Last?

headline: Zebra Technologies Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: ZBRA posts Q4 revenue growth and strong segment gains, but earnings missed estimates as expenses climbed and cash levels declined.

headline: 3M Uses AI Tools To Tighten Customer Links And Materials Choice
summary: 3M (NYSE:MMM) has introduced Ask 3M and the 3M Digital Materials Hub, two digital tools that use generative AI and advanced modeling to support customer product design. The new platforms are intended to help engineers and designers solve materials challenges and speed up development timelines through virtual collaboration and simulation. For investors watching 3M at a share price of $172.85, these launches highlight how the company is using its materials expertise in a more digital,...
